website_summaries.verdict: Standard air fryer accessory set with several nice extras not included in other sets.
pros: Includes a cake pan, pizza pan, skewers rack, metal holder, egg bites molds, plate gripper, oven mitts, oil brush, muffin cups, 100 liners, and magnets with common cooking times and temperatures for different foods
Can be used in most air fryers or Instant Pots
cons: Silicone mitts can melt when taking items out of the air fryer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to air fryer! These accessories are a great addition to make the air fryer event more versatile. It has anything you could want or need for you air fryer, very useful and all pieces fit my philips viva perfectly. Very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This set worked well with my Philips dry fryer, the food rack double the capacity I could cook each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Wow, ok this is a bargain for the price. I have a Ninja airfryer the items fit perfectly. They are easy to clean and quality..I am surprised because they where so inexpensive. Very happy with the set
customer_reviews.author: alina martinez

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was exactly as promised.  Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The cupcake silicone shells were too thin to hold their shape. Other than that, the pieces are so small I just think of a set of pans for a doll house instead of for real use. That small pizza pan might just hold a 5 inch pizza. My mistake! I just was expecting normal size pieces. Air Fryer/Baker/etc. is probably going to end up in the closet somewhere. It would take more work than it's worth to make so many batches to make a real meal this way. Again, my fault for expecting more from this product and the accessories I bought for it's use.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Rose 53

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of products to use with my air fryer. The only reason for the 1 star deduction was because the hand grips melted with the heat when used.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Handy accessories for a great appliance.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my air fryer for almost a year and use it often, but have never had extra accessories. So I ordered this, knowing there would be some pieces I don't need but the price was right and I think it was a good purchase. The air fryer is a great appliance, I use it to cook all kinds of crispy foods like French Fries for instance, and it's great for reheating a lot of foods, many of them come out better than the first time because they're crispier. Anyway, I think the accessories will make my fryer handier than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Bad product and bad seller.
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. DO NOT BUY! Cheap product. All the silicone melted in my ninja foodi on the first use and ruined my basket. Seller promised to rectify situation and never followed through. Bad product and bad seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the pan I bought is exactly the same as described. This is a great beginning set and a great value, and it is all accompanied by it compared to other sets. After my last bad experience, I was worried that I couldn't trust the seller, but under Amazon's return policy, I decided it wouldn't hurt to try these guys because they showed the exact size in the description. Very happy. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: What are the cups, paper liners and muffin liners for?
customer_reviews.text: This is somewhat useful. Maybe if they knew how to spell vegetables? (check the magnetic signs). No recipe for anything along the lines of baking, so I'm not sure what to do with the silicone cups. No instruction or recipe for the paper liners, or muffin cups. Not sure how to use them in an air fryer? Totally not from this country, but does a few useful pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Air Fryer Accessories
customer_reviews.text: These accessories were a waste of money. For starters they are too small and I haven't used any of them. I wish I had returned them. Well, live and learn! The cookbook is really small and nothing in it that I wanted. You really don't need the pans that came with it. Just use what you already have.
customer_reviews.author: Sactograndma

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: These accessories are made well and will help us to use our air fryer much more! The bonus 125 page recipe book is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Pans Needed
customer_reviews.text: There should be a kit of just the items used most often, such as the pizza pan. Nobody wants to spend about $30 on a whole kit when you only need a pizza pan. A set of 3 pans would be nice!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Some much stuff packed in a boxed.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with so many pieces of stuff. I love the liners no more i have to cut to size to fit it. These are perfect!. Love the holders i will be putting them to use. I will be using them a lot more. Just so many possibilities lovr the goodies....🥰👍
customer_reviews.author: Ana Torres

customer_reviews.title: Best accessories for the air fryer ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for more than 2 months and it goes perfect with my air fryer! Favorite thing in this set is the tongs. Really nice to get things out of the air fryer without burning my fingers. The toast rack is perfect for bread and frozen waffles. And the magnets definitely takes the guess work out of how much time i should cook something.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A lot of variety
customer_reviews.text: I like it A great addition to air fryer! These accessories are a great addition to make the air fryer event more versatile. It has anything you could want or need for you air fryer, very useful and all pieces fit my philips viva perfectly. Very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Schnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Better have at least 20-20 vision!
customer_reviews.text: Good luck reading the magnetic cards! The print is so tiny they are useless. Haven't used anything else yet but I just may pass it all on to the local thrift shop....
customer_reviews.author: Dee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for airfryer
customer_reviews.text: This is is best air fryer accessorie kit!! It has everything you need plus some. I didn't know how badly I needed this. I love to cook Keto recipes and recipes for my family that are not Keto. We love the pizza accessories and all the bakery products.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Not really....
customer_reviews.text: The inserts are rather small, but fit the basket. It's just that I haven't really used any of them and don't yet know that I will. My air fryer is rather small for a household of 2. It as well as the inserts might be sufficient for a single person though.
customer_reviews.author: Antje Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my own fault but I searched my brand of air fryer and this came up and these are way too small for my air fryer. Such a waste of my money. I thought I would try the smal, circle rack today and total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Di Swan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love the accessories. All are easy to use and clean. We love our air fryer and so far everything I've cooked using the air fryer got a thumbs up from my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love Them All
customer_reviews.text: Loved getting this box of accessories. Every item is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome stuff in here. Love them all
customer_reviews.text: I really like the selection of items here. I haven't used the all but they all look good quality and all necessary if you want to take advantage of your air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: ymillyg

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Great. I’ve used them quite a bit. Still trying to figure out where to use some of the pieces but I’m sure they will get their day..... but good quality accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent great price
customer_reviews.text: Great love it, with its recipe 3 recipes sticker for fridge, WHAT AMAZING IDEA + BOOKLET RECIPE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only air fryer accessories you need

customer_reviews.text: Description says "100 pcs. air fryer liner." Received a package of only 50!

customer_reviews.author: RaTonda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection of handy tools
customer_reviews.text: The gripper tool is nice for removing the smaller inner pots out of the air fryer. I like the pre-cut and perforated parchment papers, they fit nicely in the pans and inside the original air fryer basket. Basting tool is nice. All around good mix of handy gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.text: Silicone finger mits melted on first time use. Not going to try the silicone muffin cup.

customer_reviews.title: Everything they say it is!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this! It is everything that they say it is!! I can only say from personal experience is that the food it cooked was awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The metal pieces work great, but the plastic pieces are almost useless. I would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Unit provides great food.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the taste of the food. The biggest issue is depending on what you are cooking, the cleanup of the basket can be a little lengthy.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We threw away the silicone stuff because of all the reviews saying that they melted. But the set was worth buying for the little pans alone.

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these accessories. I can make pretty much anything I would in the oven now in my air fryer. Definitely worth it.

customer_reviews.title: the stacking racks are too close together .  at least on side of the kabob rack should be taller
customer_reviews.text: Used in my Ninja Foodi Air Fryer Grill. cooked two large salmon filets at the same time by stacking the racks

customer_reviews.title: very fast shipping and easy to use

Last week i made various dishes according to the recipe and then won lots of praises from my families. A joyful experience.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her accessories for her air fryer.

customer_reviews.title: Their really small. Perfect if your cooking for only 1 to 2 people.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend these if you have a small air fryer. I expected them to be a lot larger than shown. Their really made I would think for a 2 to 3 qt air fryer, their a perfect size for those. Their made really well, and seems like they’d be really easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: I won't use the silicone items
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice kit that fits nicely into my air fryer. HOWEVER, using the silicone mitts to take things in and out of the oven that were only baked at 350 and finding they were MELTING, I will not be using ANY of the included silicone items for baking/cooking. I don't want melted silicone in my food. If the mitts melt that easy in the 10 seconds it takes to move items out of the oven....well....
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Bush

customer_reviews.title: "Silicone" mits

customer_reviews.title: I am sooo angry.  I ingested silicone!!  Mitts are toxic and dangerous, pans are dangerous!!
customer_reviews.text: I was doing my dishes after I ate and noticed something weird sticking to the pan. Then I noticed it was hardened blue material. I’m so freakin mad right now. I’ve not been feeling well and I’m wondering if this is related. Amazon first offered a return and then I reintegrated my problem and they issued a refund. I need the manufacturers phone number and address.
customer_reviews.author: YourKatNippers

customer_reviews.title: A Hit and a Miss...
customer_reviews.text: Timely arrival. Box was damaged; however, do two excellent packaging the product was in fine condition. What is the story on this Recipe Guide that came with the pans??? As in; the picture shows the picture of cheesecake but says it's a recipe for lamb chops!!!?? Also it contains absolutely no instructions for using the silicone cups or the little egg cups!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. AllBright

product_meta.title: 17 Pcs Air Fryer Accessories with Recipe Cookbook for Growise Phillips Cozyna Fits All 3.2QT - 5.8QT Air Fryer, 7in Deep Fryer Accessories
product_meta.description:
Size:7IN-17PCSAir Fryer Accessory Kit Includes: 
1 Cake Barrel, (Diameter: 7 in, Height: 3 in) 
1 Pizza Pan, (Diameter: 7 in, Height: 1 in) 
1 Metal Holder, (Diameter: 7 in, Height: 1 in) 
1 Skewer Rack, (Diameter: 7.5 in, Height: 2.75 in) 
1 Silicone Mat, (Diameter: 7 in, Height: 0.25 in) 
1 Egg Bites Molds, (Diameter: 6.5 in, Height: 1.5 in) 
1 Toast Rack, (Length: 5.6 in, Height: 1.75 in)
1 Pair of Silicone Mitts, 
1 Kitchen Plate Gripper, (Length: 7 in) 
6 Silicone Muffin Cups, (Diameter: 2.75 in, Height: 1.26 in) 
1 Air Fryer Recipe Cookbook.
1 x Oil Brush
3 x Icing Smoother
100 x Air Fryer Liner

Cake Barrel, Pizza Pan 
Temperature range -40°F to 446°F(-40°C to 230°C), not only can be used in air fryer, but also oven free, microwave free, freezer free.

Skewer Racks 
Double layers racks, you can make more chicken wings at one batch.

Silicone Mat, Metal Holder 
Very handy place to set hot stuff on, 
Protect your household surfaces.

Kitchen Plate Gripper 
If your cuisine makes the plate too hot to touch, you can easily remove them using the plate gripper.

Silicone Muffin Cups, Egg Bites Mold 
Food grade premium silicone, safe to touch food directly.

Silicone Oven Mitts 
Excellent heat-resistant ability, easy to hold freshly baked cake、pizza、biscuits.

Air Fryer Recipe Cookbook 
Include 25+ delicious recipes and fun way to use your air fryer accessories.
feature_bullets: ▶17 Pcs Air Fryer Accessories Kit◀ Includes 1 Cake Barrel, 1 Pizza Pan, 1 Metal Holder, 1 Skewers Rack, 1 Toast Rack, 1 Silicone Mat, 1 Egg Bites Molds, 1 Pair of Silicone Oven Mitts,1 Kitchen Plate Gripper, 6 Silicone Muffin Cups,1 Air Fryer Recipe Cookbook, 1 Oil Brush, 3 Pcs Icing Smoother, 100 Pcs Air Fryer Liners.

▶Perfect Fits All 3.2QT – 5.8QT Air Fryer◀ The size of this set is 7 in, thus our accessory set fits 3.2qt – 5.8qt of most brands deep air fryer, likes Gowise, Phillips, Cozyna. This set can also be used in oven, instant pot and microwave.

▶Expand Your Cooking Repertoire◀ Bake favorite cake in the Cake Barrel, cook delicious pizza in the Pizza Pan, maximize cooking surface with the Metal Holder and make skewers with the Rack! Bake desserts in Muffin Cups, protect your hands from heat with the Oven Mitts and protect your household surfaces with the Silicone Mat.

▶Enjoy Your Cooking Time◀ 3 Pcs Icing Smoother are used to create designs on the side or top of cakes, you just scrape around the edge of your cake when your cheese or icing is still wet for great patterns.

▶Dishwasher Safe◀ All accessories are dishwasher safe. The Cake Barrel and Pizza Pan are coated with Teflon non-stick coating, please do not use rough cloth or metal ball vigorously to rub for protecting anti-stick coating.
